name: subtitle-utils

2.0.0.name: subtitle-utils
2.0.0.description: Validate subtitle timings and fix numbering errors.

readme:
# subtitle-utils package

This plugin validates subtitle timings, letting the user know which subtitle has
timing related errors in it. An example of such an error is a subtitle beginning
after it has ended or the subtitle beginning before the last one has ended.

![A screenshot of your package](https://github.com/verrev/subtitle-utils/blob/master/res/screenshot.png)

metadata.name: subtitle-utils
metadata.description: Validate subtitle timings and fix numbering errors.
